attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KD22G5xJXsm6wNbp4yx_freetext
attribs.current: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty. Choose one of the following options. You can't take a Fighting Style option more than once, even if you later get to choose again. Archery, Defense, Dueling, Great Weapon Fighting, Protection, or Two-Weapon Fighting.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KD22G5xJXsm6wNbp4yx_display_text
attribs.current: When you roll a 1 or 2 on a two-handed melee damage roll, reroll the die and use the new roll.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KD22G5xJXsm6wNbp4yy_freetext
attribs.current: On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points.

attribs.name: proficiencies
attribs.current:
Armor: All armor, shields
Weapons: Simple, martial
Tools: Smith's, tinker's

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: His moral compass obliterated by a traumatizing past, Volkovoy holds little sacred. Nonetheless, he has some sense of correct or fairness, and is highly offended by percieved wrongdoing.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: I will find the shadow-creature that killed my family and taste sweet vengeance.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: Volkovoy is a creature of habit: "slow to embrace new ideas". He's weary of magic, and skeptical of intellectuals and pomp. His stubbornness and frankness about these beliefs could potentially land him in hot water. While not a complete fool, complex concepts  are beyond him.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: Volkovoy is stern and imposing. He often seems distant, removed. Deep within his eyes are a pain long-burdened. And yet, Volkovoy has a gentler, fatherly side. He's like to take some fragile, innocent thing under his wing given the opportunity.

attribs.name: miscellaneous_notes
attribs.current:
Possible Feats: Great Weapon Master, Sentinel, Heavy Armor Master, War Caster

Taken Feats: 
Heavy Armor Master (Increase your Strength score by 1, to a maximum of 20. While you are wearing heavy armor, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage that you take from non-magical weapons is reduced by 3.

Possible Cantrips/Spells (at lvl 1): Booming Blade, Lightning Lure, Shield, Earth Tremor, Ice Knife
       Other Options: Burning Hands, Absorb Elements, Green-Flame Blade

attribs.name: damage_resistances
attribs.current: Take 3 less damage from bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from non-magical weapons while wearing heavy armor.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KF8CV0nxs7Mi-FfA-5I_content
attribs.current: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KF8CV0nxs7Mi-FfA-5I_emote
attribs.current: creates an invisible barrier of magical force to protect himself

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KF8CV0nxs7Mi-FfA-5J_content
attribs.current:
You cause a tremor in the ground in a 10-foot radius. Each creature other than you in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. If the ground in that area is loose earth or stone, it becomes difficult terrain until cleared.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KF8CV0nxs7Mi-FfA-5J_emote
attribs.current: causes a tremor in the ground

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KF8CV0nxs7Mi-FfA-5J_target
attribs.current: each creature other than you in the aoe

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KF8CV0o0Iggjar3oZGY_content
attribs.current:
You create a shard of ice and fling it at one creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 piercing damage. Hit or miss, the shard then explodes. The target and each creature within 5 feet of the point where the ice exploded must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d6 cold damage.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the cold damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KF8CV0o0Iggjar3oZGY_emote
attribs.current: conjures a shard of ice and flings it at a creature

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KF8CV0o0Iggjar3oZGY_materials
attribs.current: A drop of water or piece of ice

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KFBJkFbsd21ePUAhN3A_freetext
attribs.current: On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KFBJkFbsd21ePUAhN3A_display_text
attribs.current: On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KFBJkfmAsNSnZ8hqEZ3_content
attribs.current:
As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must make a melee attack with a weapon against one creature within the spell's range, otherwise the spell fails. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, and green fire leaps from the target to a different creature of your choice that you can see within 5 feet of it. The second creature takes fire damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.
This spell's damage increases when you reach higher levels. At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra 1d8 fire damage to the target, and the fire damage to the second creature increases to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. Both damage rolls increase by 1d8 at 11th level and 17th level.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KFBJkfmAsNSnZ8hqEZ3_emote
attribs.current: causes green fire to leap from creature to creature

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KFI-D9pPBqyQDlu-Aal_freetext
attribs.current: On your turn, you can take one additional action on top of your regular action and a possible bonus action.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KFI-D9pPBqyQDlu-Aal_display_text
attribs.current: On your turn, you can take one additional action on top of your regular action and a possible bonus action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KGno758J6HbjMdUgKbz_content
attribs.current:
You create a lash of lightning energy that strikes at one creature of your choice that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet in a straight line toward you and then take 1d8 lightning damage if it is within 5 feet of you.

This spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

attribs.name: repeating_equipment_-KGoi-s7EzIGolz3zQae_content
attribs.current: Will repel undead from it if burned

attribs.name: repeating_equipment_-KGPQ8nhTGOErpEBaDFT_content
attribs.current:
(Gatekeeper armor) I can repair it in [[11]] days (80 gp)
<<7/80>>

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KHy4gHIFG6Ys33AS3Zu_content
attribs.current: The spell captures some of the incoming energy, lessening its effect on you and storing it for your next melee attack. You have resistance to the triggering damage type until the start of your next turn. Also, the first time you hit with a melee attack on your next turn, the target takes an extra 1d6 damage of the triggering type, and the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KInYrXBAQ2-W8Vrzk3I_display_text
attribs.current:
At 3rd level, you learn a ritual that creates a magical bond between yourself and one weapon. You perform the ritual over the course of 1 hour, which can be done during a short rest. The weapon must be within your reach throughout the ritual, at the conclusion of which you touch the weapon and forge the bond.
Once you have bonded a weapon to yourself, you cant be disarmed of that weapon unless you are incapacitated. If it is on the same plane of existence, you can summon that weapon as a bonus action on your turn, causing it to teleport instantly to your hand.
You can have up to two bonded weapons, but can summon only one at a time with your bonus action. If you attempt to bond with a third weapon, you must break the bond with one of the other two.
